name: Age Of Wars - Defense Game
description:
Action defense game, play 40 levels in 8 ages, battle against 32 characters, use 37 weapons, spells, effects, and unlock 34 achievements! Tons of upgrades and special effects!

Take a more interactive approach in Age of Wars to defending your precious cave. You will need some quick clicking skills to master this game. After each level, you will gain points, but this time you will simply upgrade yourself and/or buy new weapons of destruction with which to maim the hapless cavemen with.

Good luck!
